question: I was diagnosed with breast cancer last year. I had a bi-lateral mastectami, with clear margins, no lymph node involvement. My blood sugars have been running between 200-300, do you think that further testing will be required to make sure this is not cancer? My doctor isn't planning to check it again for 4 months, and that seems too long to me.
title: 1.2 cm lung nodule
